channel.title: Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning
channel.description: Recent content in Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning

item.title: Family Fun Day on the Trail
item.description: Join your friends and neighbors on the South Tama Rec Trail for Family Fun Day on June 10, 2023! Our activities and schedule of events are subject to change. Check this page for updates as June 10, 2023 approaches. A list of scavenger hunt items will be available to download here at a later date, and paper copies will be available at stations along the trail on June 10.

item.title: Steering Committee Meeting
item.description: The original committees from Tama and Toledo, and others who wish to join the effort, are invited to meet and discuss organization, priorities, and next steps. This meeting will be held in the Tama Civic Center. Agenda specifics: Previous Next     Page: /
